website_summaries.verdict: Cool maker that comes with 1 extra mold. Stands up in freezer without falling down.
pros: Comes with tray that holds mold and acts like a base
Included: silicone funnel, recipes, cleaning brush
cons: Recipe book is limited, lids are hard to snap on and could come off easily

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been blending frozen fruit and eating like a slushee for a couple weeks. Then I thought how nice it would be to eat as a popsicle! But first... I've made some mint-lemonade pops! I take fresh mint and diffuse in filtered water. Add a couple juiced lemons and several dropperfulls of SweetLeaf stevia drops. They're delicious!! All natural.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: These are great molds. The base makes them nice and stable for my son to fill himself with his fruit concoctions and the funnel makes it even easier. I bought two sets and both have been in use since they arrived. My son make's a new batch as soon as he has 6 empty molds. It's been a great way to use our backlog of foraged berries in the freezer from last summer...a much healthier (and cheaper) alternative to store bought fruit pops :) Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Cream and Frozen Yogurt mold set
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I would have to have some stainless steel ones but can't afford those right now. The Ice Cream Recipes E-book you download is not worth anything most of the ones listed do not even have the recipes, just a description of a recipe. So if you are looking to purchase this because of the Ice Cream Recipes E-book you will be disappointed, you can find 100's of recipes online for free so not big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lewis

customer_reviews.title: They are great.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to be able to make my own popsicles. As soon as I got the molds, I washed them and made some popsicles. I discovered that, like one reviewer said, just set the sticks on, don't press then down. I pressed them down and have trouble getting them off, now that they are frozen, otherwise, they are great. I just ordered some more, so I can make different flavors at the same time. Need to figure out how to make just enough filling for 6 popsicles. I bought one set with the brush cleaner and the funnel and the rest, just the molds.
customer_reviews.author: L. Forrer

customer_reviews.title: caps not secure on all pieces and complaint ignored
customer_reviews.text: Wrote a previous review stating that 2 tops were not at all secure and wanted to have these replaced. Received answer that there was nothing wrong with the two and that this is how they are supposed to be . Not good answer for a long time capable cook who can tell the obvious difference between a cap that is secure and one that just falls off. Not willing to have a mess in my freezer and will not recommend or ever buy again from this maker/dealer/ seller.
customer_reviews.author: MDE

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I cant even say how well these work in the freezer because I set I just recieved and just opened has been used before and never cleaned or santized properly or even sold as a used item. Mine was all beat up with hair on the inside along with stuck on food.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Stewart

customer_reviews.title: so I'm very happy about that
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged, and worked as expected! At first, I was afraid that the icecream was going to break away from the stick, and get stuck inside the container, but so far it hasn't happened, so I'm very happy about that! 10/10 would recommend! :) The only thing I would say, is that when you take it out of the freezer, be sure to run it under cool water for a few seconds. This way, it's easier to take the popsicle out without breakage to the container!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Great popsicle (paletas) mold.
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from Mexico where I rediscovered my love for their “paletas.” I searched for a mold where I could recreate my favorites and chose the Lebice molds. I love the fact that each popsicle can be filled and cleaned individually. As an added bonus, it comes with a cleaning brush and collapsible funnel. Not only that, they sent a link for a free ebook of recipes. Check out my first batch of “Fresas con crema”. It tastes as wonderful as it looks. Next: Piña colada!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mraz

customer_reviews.title: Cooking class popsicle
customer_reviews.text: During these stay at home times my granddaughters (ages 7 & 9) and I have virtual cooking classes. I sent these popsicle molds to their home prior to their class. The molds were well packaged and easy to use. In addition to the molds, popsicle sticks, tray to hold the molds, also Included was a funnel to make adding the foods easy and a brush for easy clean up. All of these factors made them easy to use and fun for the grandchildren. I was so impressed that I order some for my house for when they come to visit (and use for myself).
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Dream
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this. Exactly what I needed. My kid loves fruit. Will eat fruit all day. These let me sneak vegetables into his diet. Whir up blueberries and broccoli together - voila. Blueberry popsicles with stealth broccoli. Excellent! Popsicles slide right out. Easy to use and clean. And customer service is top-notch. Had an issue downloading the e-cookbook. Got a response within hours. Problem solved. Great product and company. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marsh

customer_reviews.title: This is a well designed product and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: On a particularly hot night recently, we ordered this kit almost on a whim. There are many to choose from on Amazon, but this one looked like it will stand up best to heavy use. We were not disappointed when it arrived. It's very easy to use and makes good-size popsicles. Even the reusable "sticks" are made well. For our first batch, we used chocolate milk and they came out almost like fudgesicles. We are so impressed with this kit that we bought a second one as a little summer gift for our young grandson. This seller certainly did a good job on this product.
customer_reviews.author: esrael m.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and they arrived today. Immediately, I filled four out of the six with a homemade fudgesicle recipe. The box says leak resistant but the lid would not fit securely on. I would not buy again and I emailed Amazon with a complaint. I am hoping for a refund. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Flora

customer_reviews.title: More plastic garbage made in China.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Strong plastic odor, smells like a burning trash bag. 2. Packaging states "100% Tupperware Quality". I would have preferred 110%, this is probably less than 6% Tupperware Quality. 3. The eBook of 50 Delicious Popsicle Recipes is "By Rhianna". If you say so, "Gady Lev". 4. "Create Greate Ice Pops Today with Fruit and Yugurt". No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: My children love to create popsicles and our kits in the past ...
customer_reviews.text: My children love to create popsicles and our kits in the past were cheaply made or didn't hold up right. This kit is great (and especially the funnel which makes pouring into the mold MUCH easier)! Overall a super easy kit to use and create popsicles. We like to go on Pinterest or online and find yummy popsicles. This would be a cute gift though for a budding cook with a popsicle making cookbook. The big plus with this kit and making your own popsicles is that you can make healthy creations. Overall this product is great!
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I've been dying to make my own popsicles. I had made them for my little one, but she was asleep when they were ready so my husband and I tried them out. I used one of the recipes that came with it but tweaked it a bit (I didn't use chocolate almond milk, but regular almond milk so I added agave). I can't wait to experiment with some other recipes. I highly recommend this product if you want to make your own homemade popsicles.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Good molds
customer_reviews.text: This product is good and much easier to use. I received a recipes e-book after it shipped and it helped me to make multiple verities at home. need to keep them in water before taking pops out. Plastic seems sturdy, Overall I would say worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Anu Venu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for the first time this evening. I tried both ways: three with the provided plastic sticks/caps and three with the silicon caps and wooden sticks. Both were easy to remove after running under warm water. I really appreciate the little funnel that was included as that made poring easy. I also really appreciated the bag that was included to keep all the parts and pieces together. They are a good size without taking up too much freezer space, and are easy to clean. These were really great. I honestly can't find a single negative thing to say!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha O.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a sweet tooth...
customer_reviews.text: I can make my own popsicles with less sugar. Great for me as I've been struggling with my weight all my life. Just make sure that they are truly frozen or they will break apart. I was in a rush to try the ones I made so I didn't wait. But the other turned out fine. They are super easy to clean. Mostly I just rinsed them with hot water to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Watts

customer_reviews.title: A very well designed product that exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: We decided to try 100% fruit juice/fruit popsicles as a healthier snack and dessert. This set was very reasonably priced so we gave it a try. I was very impressed how the product exceeded expectations. The parts came in a nice very efficiently packed box and included a cleaning brush and extra mold - very nice touches. The product itself is well made, and included a small instruction manual which came in handy. Speaking of instructions, if you follow them you will be rewarded with a quality popsicle, and if you use fresh fruit and real fruit juice, pretty healthy too. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: James Laabs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Popsicle Set!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that this set of Popsicle molds was so nice! It's very inexpensive, yet the molds are good quality, the come with both plastic and silicon lids, a funnel for filling the molds, a brush for cleaning them, and a tray to hold them in the freezer. They include some recipes, plus they will send you a book of recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Stay Cool
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a chance to use yesterday and I'm glad. They really are easy to use and just use your imagination and experiment with what you want. I just wanted to test them so did 2 sweet teas, 2 V8 juice and 2 pink grapefruit juice with sections inside. Waited the 6 hours like they said, well, I was actually away for the evening so by time I got home it had been 10 hours but I took a sweet tea one out, ran some warm water over it a few seconds and voila! Out came my cool sickle of sweet tea. I can tell I'm gonna have fun with these babies. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L Duncan

customer_reviews.title: COOL molds
customer_reviews.text: These molds were perfect ! I had not trouble releasing the treat. I just let it sit a minute and it slipped right out. The size is adequate: not too large, not too small. I just filled them with fruit juice and they were very tasty and refreshing. I was looking for a cool treat that was not high in calories. I'm looking forward to trying out some of the other recipes in the recipe book you order on line.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ippolito

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Update: have updated to 5 stars, the product works well. Caution to other buyers- the funnel and brush are only available in certain colors. I found this odd and totally unclear that a color choice would not include the parts that make this set great to use. Update: have been contacted by customer service to resolve, will update review based on the outcome Was looking forward to this purchase and making healthy frozen treats but this was an obvious return item and didn't have the funnel for filling them. Looks like a return, don't need the mess this will be with out the tool to fill the pops
customer_reviews.author: Draco

customer_reviews.title: Great Popsicle Molds
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite popsicle molds! I have tried the ones from the big box store and these are excellent. I have been able to make a variety of fruit pops, fruit juice pops, protein fruit pops and yogurt fruit pops. The funnel makes pouring your ingredients into the molds a breeze. These are also larger than the ones I purchased from the big box store. I'm going through chemotherapy right now and suffer from chemo-induced mucositis which on some days makes it hard for me swallow water without pain/discomfort. Making these popsicles the night before chemo allows me to have a treat I can enjoy when the side effects kick-in post treatment. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the Past!!
customer_reviews.text: I had similar ones years ago, and now I have some just for me. I made crystal light concentrated and added heavy whipping cream, and they were so good. Took some raspberry’s and fruit punch and mixed together with a little vodka, wow....it was great. Crushed up cucumber w mint and so refreshing on a hot day. So very easy to clean up. There are so many ideas that you can come up with. I am going to order another set so on Ladies Bunko night, we can have such a blast from the past
customer_reviews.author: Sherry P.

customer_reviews.title: They are smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The attached handle/top is a good idea to avoid drips on your hand while you eat the popsicle, but you cannot make more than one batch until you eat all of the first batch. Maybe include and extra set of handles. I didn't try any of your recipes but I did find some on-line and watermelon was my favorite. I am going to try chocolate pudding pops next. Great idea and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great way to give your kids "ice cream"!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to use. I would have liked the bottom holding tray be a tad thicker and sturdier, but it gets the job done. I blend smoothies with strawberries, bananas, plain Greek yogurt, spinach, almond milk, and chia seeds, and freeze them in these molds. When my toddler asks for ice cream, I give her one of these "ice cream" bars, and she goes to town! Love making my own pops, knowing they are truly healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, easy to use....one suggestion to make this perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect, exactly as described. Our grandkids loved helping make these pops....very easy, especially with the collapsible funnel. We made blueberry peach and banana strawberry, both nice combos. We've also tried bourbon peach pops for us grownups. We ordered two sets for obvious reasons. The only suggestion I'd make is to include a folder with recipes and instructions for how to release the pops after they're frozen. (We bought a separate book which was very helpful, but including something with this product would be terrific.)
customer_reviews.author: m foster

customer_reviews.title: A Great Summer Hobby
customer_reviews.text: I love these popsicle makers. I am a Lifetime Weightwatchers member. I have been making their popsicle recipes all summer and have enjoyed them thoroughly. They are easy to make with a blender. I've made fudgesicles, pineapple chipotle popsicles and even key-lime pie popsicles. Those are my favorites. I love experimenting with food. You can pour your favorite smoothie and cold soup into them. Much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice bonus of recipes to use or for inspiration, Appear as Described...
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly, appear to be as described tho haven't them used yet. Nice bonus of recipes to use or for inspiration. Seller was kind enough to email link to recipes without my requesting. Though the package had one of the square scannable things that said it would take you to recipes. I didn’t have a chance to try it before an email was received from seller It was also nice to get both a handy collapsible funnel & tiny brush for cleaning any nooks & crannies. Hope they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: angelluv

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is the type that things slide off of them very easily, which is good for pulling the popsicles out. Any issue one might have about a popsicle mold is solved with this set: Dropped one and broke the mold?—one extra included; Hard to clean?—Perfectly sized brush included (they also do just fine in the dishwasher); Hard to fill? Collapsible silicone funnel included. I only wish there were more molds in the set. I am considering buying another.
customer_reviews.author: bearncessities

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: Works great, have made lemonade popsicles, smoothie popsicles, and a few other fruit popsicles. All worked great. The cleaning tool provided is very useful since I don't trust these in a dishwasher. Tip - run the popsicle (while still inside the plastic sleeve) under hot water a few seconds before trying to slide out - works better :D
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A quality product. I had no trouble making convincing popsicles, and, depending on consistency, the funnel worked well (sometimes I could just pour into the forms directly from the blender). I found that it's better not to fill them to the top because it's hard to eat that last bit... Fruit/berry smoothies with a lot of banana, blended well (Vitamix well), produce great results. Watery smoothies produce hard ice that isn't as pleasant, that's where banana comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Akom

customer_reviews.title: Felt like a kid again!
customer_reviews.text: The hubby and I enjoyed the pops the first day they got here. Washed them up, filled them with some good stuff and later that evening enjoyed a ice pop. We felt like kids again, even with some of the adult ingredients in them. All this quaranteening has some great recipes out there for Dirty Pirate Ice Pops. Yum
customer_reviews.author: Beth G.

customer_reviews.title: So happy - I bought a second set!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - very sturdy pieces. The funnel is flexible so it can be put directly into Popsicle holder - no mess when pouring liquids in! The base/holder is solid plastic so it's easy to fill, move and store Popsicles. Ordered a second set because I loved the first one so much. I like that the Popsicle "stick" part has a bowl shape on the bottom to ensure no dripping, pieces dropping off the bottom onto clothes. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped for...
customer_reviews.text: I like these molds because I can put just one or all 6 in the freezer. When there's not much room in my freezer (most of the time), I set these popsicle molds into spaces here and there. I do not have to rearrange my whole freezer to accommodate 6 popsicle molds that must be kept together. I'm very glad I chose these molds. They are sturdy and will probably last a very long time, even though we use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Foster

customer_reviews.title: Have been using these for a year, they work great
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these weekly for almost a year, and they have not let us down. Mine didn't come with a funnel or a brush, but I don't really see a need for those. Easy to pour, easy to store in the freezer, easy to pop out of the mold before eating, easy to clean (I mostly use the dishwasher). The handle parts have a little space on the bottom to catch anything that melts, so that's useful. Overall, a simple tool but well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Pippi Longshopping

customer_reviews.title: So handy to use the mold as a case to hold popsicle while eating
customer_reviews.text: I love these popsicle molds. It is so easy to make healthy popsicles from whole fruits and yogurt. It is so handy to just reinsert the popsicle back into the mold while eating until you are ready for the next bite. I often eat them while working on my computer, so holding it in my hand the whole time I'm eating it is not efficient. Also makes it easy to put back into freezer if the whole popsicle is not eaten - which happens with my grandchildren. It seems like they don't get melty/drippy as quickly as flavored sugar water ones or ice cream bars.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well. Used lemon juice, finely grated lemon zest, green tea, and seltzer water (in hopes that the texture would be more chewable than a block of ice), and it worked? Delicious. Only issue: The handle part is about a half inch deep and I cannot get my tongue in there to get that last little bit -- so, unless I've brought a bowl or am eating it over the sink, that extra little bit could be a mess if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: JimG-SC

customer_reviews.title: Entire family loving the popsicles
customer_reviews.text: Why buy expensive popsicles when we can now make them at home! We love the flexibility in being able to use our own popsicle sticks or use the plastic ones included. The base is perfect for catching drips especially when there is a toddler involved. It's also easy to remove the popsicles from the mold after briefly running them under warm water. We are looking forward to enjoying popsicles throughout the warm weather days.
customer_reviews.author: yltran

customer_reviews.title: Great product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great product, when removing i just run under some water. Lids do not click to close, but that it to make sure they are easy to take out. So you just sort of place the lids on top. No faults in this product, healthy snacks all summer long!
customer_reviews.author: Mazz

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the popsicle recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying these popsicle molds. I recently saw some popsicle recipes that a friend posted and decided to try them. I have since made several different recipes and I'm really enjoying having delicious homemade popsicle during this hot, steamy Florida weather. These molds are a good size, easy to use and I like the tray that holds them very snugly, upright so that there is no spilling. Also, a cute little collapsible funnel was included, which is very helpful in filling the molds.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional Popsicle Molds
customer_reviews.text: First I have no dislikes. Amazing set. They close and open easily. Others I have used have been a battle. Popsicle bottoms fit securely in tray. The cleaning brush is perfect. I am in love with the functioning funnel that collapses. Finishing touch an instruction/recipe pamphlet. No dought this product was designed by a woman and functions for moms, kids and older folks like me. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Djhby01

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make homemade clear liquid popsicles in preparation for a medical procedure. They were perfect. I loved how they sat up in the holder, fit in my freezer well, came out of the mold easily. Not sure why I hadn't gotten them sooner. Better late than never.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: I like how they stand up in the holder and the top is a drip catcher. I will probably never use the mini sieve as I use a measuring cup with a spout. Doubt if I'll use the mini cleaning brush either. I'm able to clean them easily with my regular cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: mariap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this set of popsicle molds! Easy to clean, easy to use. The funnel makes filling very convenient. Now that I have had a chance to use this a number of times, I must say I really love this set. Here is a recipe others might enjoy: Mix 1 1/2 cups of Plain Kefir with 3/4 cups of smashed organic strawberries. This fills 6 pops, and they are creamy and delicious! Thank you for this wonderful BPA free set - especially great on these hot summer days!
customer_reviews.author: rescuemom843

customer_reviews.title: So far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I find that I'm really using these a lot this hot Summer. I make my own mixture of bananas, frozen strawberries, soy or hemp milk and throw in some raisins for a delicious natural ice pop. I run hot water over them for half a minute or so when I take them out of the freezer and the come out very nicely. Easy to clean, and even come with a thin brush to do so. I haven't needed to use the brush so far, they just rinse clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit to keep your kid happy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes these for making juice ice pops. I really bought the kit for her. I like them too. I use my organic juice with them and I can have a healthy treat. Im not at the mercy of the store. No artificial colors or sweetners in our pops at home.
customer_reviews.author: monleigh

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ACCESSORIES
customer_reviews.text: What I liked most about the pop-molds is they provide a brush to clean every nook & cranny. Also, an extra pop mold for the one that is sure to get lost over the summer. They have a sturdy stand. We give the mold a slight spray of olive oil for easy slippage out of the mold. Or holding it in your hands a few minutes also does the trick. This mold is all I expected and more.
customer_reviews.author: CanaryDiamond10

customer_reviews.title: Want to have a Fun Summer?
customer_reviews.text: Received my Popsicle Mold Set right on time and in excellent condition. Couldn't wait to get started with my first batch of blueberry creamsicles. Followed the recipe and the mold instructions and the next day had a super yummy healthy treat. Highly recommend these molds, and will be purchasing more so I can try multiple flavors at a time. I will probably gift them to my daughter as well so she and our grandkids can have a fun healthy summer. (The free downloadable recipe book that comes with the product has some awesome ideas to try.) Get this product and reconnect with your inner child and feel good about it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Expert

customer_reviews.title: Great Popsicle Molds!
customer_reviews.text: These popsicle molds are easy to fill and stand up securely in the tray that is provided. The individual molds make it easier to select one popsicle at a time to thaw slightly for removal from the mold. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Owl67

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: The tops/sticks don’t pop on easily and the popsicles had to be practically submerged in hot water before they released. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Gadd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use-Yummy to eat
customer_reviews.text: When they changed our popsicle flavors we were quite upset until we found these. The variety of pops we make is endless. We put fresh fruit pieces in the popsicles and they are as pretty as they are delicious!! The recipe book is a huge plus as are the bags to put them in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Molds
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that they are BPA free, that it comes with a little brush to clean, and a collapsible funnel. I made healthy Popsicle and they turned out great. I did have to run them a little bit under warm water to get the Popsicle to release from the mold but I expected I would have to do so.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered these and we all love them. They sit nicely in the freezer, love how the end of the cover fits into the base so they stand up securely. So easy to take out and the cleaning brush that comes with them is great.
customer_reviews.author: LShack

customer_reviews.title: BEST Popsicle molds EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I currently purchased these Popsicle molds to make fresh fruit Popsicle's. There are so many different types but I did my homework and it paid off BIG TIME! These molds come with a collapsible funnel which makes filling them from my vita mix blender super simple (keep in mind that I puree fresh fruit so it's a little thicker than just water.) When I want a Popsicle all I do is run it under hot water for about 10 seconds and "poof" the top slides right off and I have the perfect Popsicle to enjoy (it's a healthy snack!) Look no further these molds are the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Halaska

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, remove and clean
customer_reviews.text: I love these popsicle molds. They have become extremely useful in the Phoenix summer scorching heat. Everything is included as described. With very simple ingredients delicious popsicles are ready in around 4 hours. Still have to try making yogurt popsicles.
customer_reviews.author: Ajer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product!
customer_reviews.text: I finally had the chance to make my popsicles, with my new molds. The mold, itself, was very sturdy, as were the handles. I didn't use the funnel, since my bowl had a pour spout, but I'm sure I will be using it for other flavors. The popsicle release was very easy and they turned out delicious and healthy! I can't wait to make another batch.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are a little lacking . . Like NONE. But if you are o Er 12 you can figure it out. The pictures on the box finally gave me a clue. I didn’t know what the “lids” were for, the. Saw the picture with popsicle sticks. Other than that, perfect! Don’t get rid of the photos on the packaging!!
customer_reviews.author: P.D.

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very durable i used it the same day it came in. Im an YesYouCan! independent Coach and made protein popscicles they were ready to eat withing an hour. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I've easily made popsicles several times now with these and my only complaint is that some of the stick handles are looser than others after inserted and clicked in before freezing. Sometimes a slight movement will knock a couple loose and I have to push them back in.
customer_reviews.author: THECCCREATIVE

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great, good construction and easy to maintain. All you have to do is run them under warm water to get the pops to come out of the molds. The stand helps keep the molds upright for freezing. It is convenient that the sticks are part of the lid. There is no need to buy anything extra.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and makes perfect popsicles
customer_reviews.text: These are great popsicle makers. The best thing is the tray that comes with it to hold the pops for filling. A nice tight fit that makes them easy to fill. The funnel that comes with it is fabulous. Makes filling the pops neat and clean and easy, no tipping . Getting them into the freezer without spilling is terrific . They come right out of the forms very neatly and easily by running them under some warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Service
customer_reviews.text: I had a Lebice stick break sold by another company. Even though it was another company Lebice immediately responded taking care of the situation. They also are shipping me a replacement for the broken one. Plus, the sticks are easy to clean, easy to use. I also love that I can be in charge of what goes into my kids stomachs, no dyes, or unnatural flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and as described!
customer_reviews.text: Love these molds and the sellers contacted me with a link to download the free cookbook after delivery as described. I fill about a centimeter from the top, freeze overnight, and then run under some warm water for about 30 seconds to loosen the popsicle from the mold and then enjoy! I rinse with warm soapy water immediately after use.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Homemade Fudgesicles!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these yesterday, so I made a quick fudgesicle mix and tossed them into the freezer last night. This evening for dessert, homemade fudgesicle! Awesome! Running warm water over the clear part of the mold helped release the popsicle with just a little effort. Cant wait to make more fruit popsicles this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hill

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: This popsicle set arrived quickly and is exactly as pictured and described. Made my very first popsicles ever the next day (mango and strawberry) and they came out wonderfully! The included collapsible spout made it easy to get my mixture into the molds which I really appreciated. Also, the popsicles truly came out of the mold very easily after being held under some running warm water for just a few seconds. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: T Gabel

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Frozen Yogurt!
customer_reviews.text: Tried these when my granddaughter got them for Xmas 2017. I really liked the frozen yogurt pops that we made,so I bought a set for myself. I read several reviews where folks reported problems getting the pops out ( I read the low starreviews when researching), and emphasize the need to run it under water for a few seconds to loosen the treat from the holder. Very pleased with this product, would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These work great to make healthy, tasty low cal treats. We use fresh or frozen (thawed) fruit. Throw it in the food processor or blender. I ended up getting 3 sets so I could make two more batches while I used the last of the previous batches batch. Run them under hot water for about 20 seconds to release or, if you're trying to save on water use a hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. These work really well for making ice pops and pudding pops. I have used them several times. When using a thicker substance like pudding, I found that filling a plastic bag with the pudding and then snipping the corner off of it to fill the molds works best. the funnel works great for thin fluids, such as juice. Running the filled frozen molds under warm water for a few seconds helps in getting them open when needed. Very sturdy product. I can see these lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenval

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, missing recipe ebook info
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product, has everything you need, EXCEPT the 50 recipe ebook. It even says that comes with it on the box, but doesn't list the link on the box, and there is no flyer or anything like it inside the box. I did read in the questions, where to find the ebook. The answer is it should be emailed to buyer. I double checked, I did not receive the email with the link. For that reason, I give it just 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: Nice popcycle maker
customer_reviews.text: Came on time packaged well. Made popcycles for hot weather! My husband really appreciated the drip tray under his frozen snack. I don't think they are dishwasher safe but rinse out very easy and if needed they come with a cleaning brush. Wish it included more recipes but found tons of ideas on Pintrest! I would recommend this item. If you have kids maybe two sets to keep the healthy treat ready.
customer_reviews.author: Hollis W

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 1st use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last week. When I took them out of the freezer I noticed one of them is cracked! I emailed and they sent me a replacement set promptly. Hoping the new ones hold up better. 🤞
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Yay... they are great
customer_reviews.text: Have no experience with popsicle molds. Hence dint know what to expect. But surprised with the good quality and ease of use of these molds. Very sturdy base and molds fit in perfectly. With a little warm water, the popsicles come right out with ease. Hoping they will hold well.
customer_reviews.author: Dhanashri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a yummy, healthy treat
customer_reviews.text: Fits firmly in the tray, and the lids stay on. Used my own unsweetened fruit juice, and in 24 hours had a yummy, healthy, refreshing treat. Cleaned and made more. Glad I read reviews about running the frozen pops under warm water to loosen them (recall doing that as a kid, too). Am ordering more, to make enough for a party.
customer_reviews.author: hajah

customer_reviews.title: ... of uses and it does work but it seems like the top cover for the Popsicle are not as ...
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review after a couple of uses and it does work but it seems like the top cover for the Popsicle are not as secure and come off easily that I have had a couple of spills when I would transfer them to the freezer. Other than that they are good to use but I did not like that the tops do not sit tight unless they are already frozen and made.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: Came as pictured and very simple to use and clean. Helps to satisfy my sweet tooth in a healthy way. I got the extra mold and a small booklet. Unfortunately, the free recipes that are promised are through a website where you have to pay shipping so I personally chose not to get it. These product itself is great though :)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for homemade popsicles
customer_reviews.text: Great for making healthy popsicles, we use yogurt, fruit and veggies in the mix. You do need to use the green stand, so ithis one is best when you have enough tall freezer space. I like that it comes with both reusable sticks and regular wood sticks.
customer_reviews.author: LARK5

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing Ice Pops
customer_reviews.text: I like that you don't have to buy wooden sticks for these. Although they have a drip tray which is a nice feature, you can't tilt it much or it spills all over you. That's something you can get used to. I like the drip tray so you don't get sticky hands. I made cucumber lemon Popsicle without sugar and they were very refreshing after working in the garden. I just received it this week and that's all I've made so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Davis

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU
customer_reviews.text: MADE OUT OF STURDY MATERIAL AND I LIKE THE WAY THE POPSICLE MOLDS STAND UP ON THEIR BASE. WOULD RECOMMEND THESE WHETHER YOU HAVE CHILDREN OR NOT.EVEN I LIKE A HOMEMADE POPSICLE FOR DESSERT, AND I HAVE SOME REALLY GOOD RECIPES THAT ARE HEALTHIER TO EAT THAN A LOT OF OTHER SWEETS, SO I DON'T MIND HAVING A POPSICLE ONCE A DAY.
customer_reviews.author: MICK

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set and the end-of-season price was great. I haven't used it yet, but it is identical to the other two sets that I have been using. I needed one more set because always run out and have leftover mix. The little funnel and brush are a nice addition in this set, and the follow-up email tips are helpful. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted to make homemade popsicles
customer_reviews.text: I looked at all of the possible freezing molds at the various price points and decided on this set from Lebice. It comes in a sturdy reusable storage box with two additional great features: a collapsible funnel and a cleaning brush. The whole set is good quality. I love the tray to hold the molds. It reminds me of the set my mom had from Tupperware when I was a child. The set works well and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MSUMindy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these! They're very simple to use. If you don't finish the popsicle you can always put it back in the plastic mold again. There are also so many combinations of things to make! I can't wait to see what else I can create with this
customer_reviews.author: Noodles

customer_reviews.title: Good product works great with children
customer_reviews.text: Product good worked as expected children had great fun making these they did not tip over in the freezer and was easily removed buy Dippin in warm water or holding them under your arms as my children did. However these were supposed to come with two free products they did not come with those and it was supposed to come with a pamphlet it did not come with that either.
customer_reviews.author: patsy hasbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Great Size
customer_reviews.text: I love these popsicle makers. They are super easy to use, they detach individually which makes spillage less likely. They're perfect for throwing mashed up fruit into, comes out like a delicious (and healthy!) froz fruit!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I received the pop maker last week, I have used it 3 times. Love it! Made very well, thanks for the bonus, I can keep it in the freezer while I make six more, easy to clean didn't need brush if u clean each mold when empty. Like funnel too! Thanks great product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K

customer_reviews.title: Popsicle Molds Set by Ledice
customer_reviews.text: The molds arrived on time and I LOVE them. They are perfect! The quality, the size, the holder for them, the funnel and the brush. I have purchased several sets of smaller, less expensive, ones, never satisfied with them at all, and then I discovered these. I could not be more pleased with them! And today I am making peach popsicles for my grandchildren (Update) Very easy to use and the stand works very well for the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: LJG1979

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: So far these seem to be high quality pop molds for juice, fruit, veggie pops! The day I got them I made yogurt pops with homemade yogurt blended with frozen peaches 🍑 for one batch, and mixed berries 🍓for another! Super easy for my two-year-old grandson to hold and eat and he loved them! I had a question or two and customer service was fast and friendly and helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Fun recipes included
customer_reviews.text: very impressed by the quality of this Popsicle Mold set. Fun recipes included, and more recipes available on the company web site. The Popsicles remove easily from the molds. Now, if only the inventor could figure out a way to keep kids from accidentally throwing the handles in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about how well the popsicle would separate from the molds without separating from the stick, but they prevented that by designing the sticks with three holes in the middle. The liquid freezes in and around the stick this way, giving it extra grip. Just run hot water over the base for a few seconds and they come free perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Manna

customer_reviews.title: Only way I'm possibly going to get my daily servings of fruits and veggies
customer_reviews.text: Frozen strawberries, kiwis, spinach and blueberries blended together then put into these popsicle molds. Love it! I'm terrible at getting my fruits and veggies into each meal in the recommended portions and servings. This makes it so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: VVu

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The customer service for this company is amazing. They are quick to respond, courteous, and very thoughtful. My kids love making popsicles in these molds!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These molds are made of a durable bpa free plastic. They are a perfect size, the stick is long enough to stay when you remove pop. . Comes out of mold easily. The stand is perfect for freezer. I received an email from Lebice several days after purchase about filling the mold . Nice touch, but I wish it were sooner.Do not fill to top of mold, as some will remain in cap and you will need a spoon to get ice out.
customer_reviews.author: susieq

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! Just got them in the mail a few days ago and have already made 2 recipes! This is possible because of the additional option to use popsicle sticks. You can make a batch and remove them from the mold and store to make more! Brilliance! Thank you Lebice 💗
customer_reviews.author: Christine G.

customer_reviews.title: Popsicle remains in the bowl
customer_reviews.text: Works better than other brands I've tried. The only "flaw" is, when pulling the Popsicle (hand stick) out from the popsicle bowl, most often, the food (popsicle) remained in the bowl instead of coming out on the stick.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, really works well!
customer_reviews.text: We love this mold design and come up with recipes every other week!
customer_reviews.author: Suvi Viswanathan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Comes with Cleaning Brush!
customer_reviews.text: This set was so easy to use--we made a batch of popsicles in no time. After frozen, the popsicles were easy to remove from the case and since the popsicle stick comes with a bottom "tray", any melted juice would collect in the tray (rather than getting onto the hand) during consumption. Mess-free!
customer_reviews.author: Elleinad

customer_reviews.title: Cracked molds
customer_reviews.text: WELL WE HAD THESE LESS THAN A YEAR AND 3 OF THE MOLDS CRACKED AND WE ONLY HAND WASH. AS MUCH AS MY DAUGHTER EATS THEM WE ARE CONSTANTLY REFILLING AND IF SHE HAS FRIENDS OVER WE CANT OFFER THEM AS WE DONT HAVE ENOUGH . STAY AWAY GO FOR HIGHER QUALITY UPDATE-THEY SENT US THE FUNNELS AND CLEANING BRUSH EVEN THOUGH THE ONE WE ORDERED DIDNT COME WITH IT. ON TOP OF THAT TO THE MOLDS ARE GREAF AND RELEASE EASILY. TOP NOTCH ALL THE WAY.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN ANY STORE BOUGHT  POPSICLES
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. i comes with everything you need to prepare healthy popsicles with real ingredients. Ready in 7-8 hours. Even comes with a storage bag for ease of saving pieces while you go through them each week., and recipes. Not just for kids-- I am 77 !!! Super delicious treats await !!
customer_reviews.author: judith gomez

customer_reviews.title: 5-stars! All the way!
customer_reviews.text: My recent purchase for popsicle mold came when my husband started this crazy new diet and he wanted to make homemade all natural popsicles. This product allows him to make them at home and not waste money on buying popsicles. The molds are easy to fill, easy to clean, durable and arrived earlier then expected. Thank you for this great product. Highly recommend it to anyone with man child or just a normal child!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

product_meta.title: Lebice Popsicle Molds Set - BPA Free - 6 Ice Pop Makers + 1 Silicone Lid + Silicone Funnel + Cleaning Brush + Recipes E-book
feature_bullets: High-Quality set for ice pop makers incl 6 Molds with Tray,1 Silicone Lid, Collapsible Funnel, Brush, Recipes E-book.
Practical, Fun, and Easy to Use. The popsicles can be easily removed by running warm water over the mold for 20 seconds.
Maximum Cleanliness – Specially designed for a mess-free experience. Clean the set by hand or in the dishwasher.
BPA-Free Plastic – Reduces waste with reusable design. Can be used for all-natural freeze pops using juice, yogurt, etc
Lifetime Satisfaction Guarantee – We’ll replace or refund your order if you’re not happy. Unbeatable customer service

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,336 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
